This recent tack she has made Insisting that the Democratic party MUST Permanently Give Up on things like Universal Health Care, drug reform, campaign reform, college access, and essentially Everything that Really Matters to ME as a voter has Convinced me that I CANNOT - under Any Circumstances pledge My Vote for her.
